title: Breakfast Service
description: For a quick breakfast option, i have porota which you can have with any main course. Dim vaja is a cheaper option. You can order booter daal along with other items. I have Halwa-ruti combo for breakfast. All my food are made by myself. I maintain a hygienic kitchen. So you can trust these food blindly. If you are going to office and you have short time on hand, you can order from my website.

title: Lunch Service
description: Lunch menu have some special items. I can give office delivery for lunch. if you are looking for some tasty yet reasonable lunch items,then you are on right place. You can have chicken jhal fry with plain rice. Spce level can be adjusted on your choice. Beef vuna is a frequently ordered dish from my services. You can also try this dish. Mutton kacchi is a special lunch item which you will love to order on a bulk amount.

title: Dinner Service
description: Dinner menu have light food options. I have plain rice in menu because i know sometimes you feel lazy and want to order a complete meal for dinner. I have palin ruti for those who are health conscious. Mixed vegetable can be a light dish for dinner which is healthy too. Chicken curry with light gravy is what you will definitely want for you dinner.

title: Snacks Service
description: Afternoon snacks are what we crave for every evening. I sell fresh hot shingaras at a very low price. You will love to order these shingaras again and again once you have them. I have healthy and hygeine maintained chotpoti which should be your prefer to those of street chotpoti. Chicken roll can be your choice for afternoon snack for your sudden guests as chicken rolls are everyone's favourite. Special made Kima Porotas can fill you tummy and hunger.

title: Sweets service
description: Here are some awesome sweet options for you. I can make any size of cake for you. Cakes can be decorated on your will. There is mishti doi made from fresh cow-milk. Sweet level can be adjusted on demand. I have famous sponge rosgolla which is famous on my customers. These rosgollas will melt on your mouth which are must haves. And there is traditional milk pudding for you. If you want a simple dessert after uor meal, then this milk pudding is what you will want to order.

title: Special Food service
description: Here I have some special dishes on this menu. Here you can find special duck curry. You can choose your spice level for this curry. Then I can make different type of pickles on order basis. I mostly make aam-achar, jolpai-achar, boroi-achar,chalta-achar, and any more as you wish. I have Sorse-Ilish mach on my menu.If you want this can be made Ilish fry. I have special deshi chicken curry on my menu.This deshi chicken is raised on my own farm. All the food are made with love, care and in hygienic way.
